programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Comedy ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: According to legend, Sir Simon de Canterville drowned his wife Lady Eleanor in the lake of Canterville Chase and for hundreds of years the nobleman's ghost has been cursed to haunt the manor. American patriarch Hiram B Otis moves from Boston into the country pile with his clan. Daughter Virginia makes her displeasure about the move clear and she forges a pact with Sir Simon to scare her parents back to America. programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. programme.title: The Independent
programme.desc: During the final weeks of the most consequential presidential election campaign in US history, America is poised to elect either its first female president or finally break the country's two-party gridlock with its first viable independent candidate. An idealistic young journalist gets an opportunity to work with her idol, veteran Washington political columnist Nick Booker. Eli is pursuing a story about budget cuts and by following the money, she and Booker uncover a financial conspiracy that places the fate of the election, the country, and democracy in their hands. programme.desc: Eleanor is a talented but troubled young rookie detective wrestling with the demons of her past, when she is called to the scene of a brutal mass shooting - the work of a new and terrifying murderer. programme.title: Please Don't Destroy: The Treasure of Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Directionless twenty something Ben Patterson lives with pals John and Martin. All three work at the Trout Plus outdoor goods emporium run by Ben's overbearing father, Farley. Ben resolves to earn his father's respect by unearthing the booty. programme.title: Please Don't Destroy: The Treasure of Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Directionless twenty something Ben Patterson lives with pals John and Martin. All three work at the Trout Plus outdoor goods emporium run by Ben's overbearing father, Farley. A random social media post intimates that an old compass, which Ben, John and Martin found as children, could be the missing link to discovering a bust of Marie Antoinette worth an estimated 100million US dollars. Ben resolves to earn his father's respect by unearthing the booty. programme.title: The Nun II
programme.desc: After her harrowing experience in 1950s Romania, Sister Irene moves to France and enjoys a quieter pace of life, guiding fresh-faced Sister Debra. Cardinal Conroy brings dire news - the ancient evil has escaped from Romania and is moving steadily eastwards across Europe, purpose unknown. He entreats Sister Irene to stop this murderous menace, and Sister Debra defies the Abbess to provide support. programme.title: Please Don't Destroy: The Treasure of Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Directionless twenty something Ben Patterson lives with pals John and Martin. All three work at the Trout Plus outdoor goods emporium run by Ben's overbearing father, Farley. A random social media post intimates that an old compass, which Ben, John and Martin found as children, could be the missing link to discovering a bust of Marie Antoinette worth an estimated 100million US dollars. Ben resolves to earn his father's respect by unearthing the booty. programme.title: Please Don't Destroy: The Treasure of Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Directionless twenty something Ben Patterson lives with pals John and Martin. All three work at the Trout Plus outdoor goods emporium run by Ben's overbearing father, Farley. A random social media post intimates that an old compass, which Ben, John and Martin found as children, could be the missing link to discovering a bust of Marie Antoinette worth an estimated 100million US dollars. Ben resolves to earn his father's respect by unearthing the booty. programme.title: Anyone But You
programme.desc: Bea and Ben enjoy an incredible first date, but attraction quickly burns out and they are delighted to be apart. However, fate compels the duo to reconsider, and they seize the opportunity to attend a lavish wedding in Australia, as a couple. programme.desc: After her harrowing experience in 1950s Romania, Sister Irene moves to France and enjoys a quieter pace of life, guiding fresh-faced Sister Debra. programme.title: Please Don't Destroy: The Treasure of Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Directionless twenty something Ben Patterson lives with pals John and Martin. All three work at the Trout Plus outdoor goods emporium run by Ben's overbearing father, Farley. A random social media post intimates that an old compass, which Ben, John and Martin found as children, could be the missing link to discovering a bust of Marie Antoinette worth an estimated 100million US dollars. Ben resolves to earn his father's respect by unearthing the booty. programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. For Fulham, the 3-2 fightback at Man City in 2008 that ignited their survival run.

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: One of the great Premier League rivalries is rekindled on Super Sunday as Arsenal and United collide. Arsenal's perfect record went last weekend, while United returned to form. (03.09).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Everton return to Merseyside having sealed three points in the capital previously. Here, the Toffees meet Brighton, a side without a Premier League win in their last four attempts. (04.11).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Off the mark with a draw at home to Wolves, Luton visit an invigorated Everton. Dominic Calvert-Lewin netted the winner last week in a worthy win at the Gtech for the Toffees. (30.09).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Lifted by a huge result earlier in the week, David Moyes visits his old club as West Ham travel to Goodison Park for a Premier League encounter with Sean Dyche's Everton. (01.03).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: A week after defeating Bournemouth, Fulham are back at the Cottage for the visit of Villa in the Premier League. Unai Emery's men fell at home to Manchester United last time out. (17.02).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Fulham and Bournemouth clash in the Premier League at the Cottage. Marco Silva's men let a two-goal lead slip away to Burnley last weekend, while a 10-man Cherries drew with Forest. (10.02).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Craven Cottage stages an all-London Premier League affair, as Fulham host Brentford. Bobby de Cordova-Reid scored the winning goal in Fulham's 1-0 win over Everton last weekend. (19.08).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Brighton pay a visit to Craven Cottage in the Premier League. Previously, an Alex Iwobi injury-time winner saw Fulham record only their second victory at Old Trafford since 1963. (01.03).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Still deep in trouble following defeat last weekend, Burnley pay a Premier League visit to Fulham. The goals dried up for the hosts previously, as they lost 3-0 away to Newcastle. (23.12).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Attentions turn back to the pitch for Liverpool with the visit of Bournemouth to Anfield. The Reds struggled on opening weekend of the new season, drawing at Stamford Bridge. (19.08).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Burnley arrive at Liverpool having recovered a point from a losing position for the first time this season against Fulham. The Reds' title pursuit took a hit in London previously. (10.02).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: With hopes of revenge, last year's runners-up Arsenal host the champions Manchester City - who lost to a triumphant Wolves last week - at the Emirates Stadium on Super Sunday. (08.10).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Roy Hodgson's Crystal Palace are the visitors to Kenilworth Road as Luton Town's bid for top-flight survival resumes. Both sides were dealt defeat prior to the international break. (25.11).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Newcastle refocus their Premier League efforts on Luton at Kenilworth Road here. A 17-year-old Lewis Miley found himself on the scoresheet in the Magpies' top-flight win a week ago. (23.12).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Nottingham Forest are the visitors at Luton's Kenilworth Road for this Premier League contest. Since beating West Ham a month ago, Forest have lost three on the spin. (16.03).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Luton welcome Sheffield United to Kenilworth Road. It was a precious Premier League point tinged with disappointment for Rob Edwards' men last weekend, drawing 4-4 at St James'. (10.02).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: With the reality of life in the top flight setting in, Luton's search for a Premier League win continues as they host Wolves at Kenilworth Road. The visitors also lost last weekend. (23.09).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: A win in the derby and a return to winning ways on the road, City are back at the Etihad hosting Bournemouth. For the first time this season, Bournemouth secured victory last week. (04.11).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Pairing Premier League defeat with another for the first time in five years, champions Manchester City require a response as they entertain the travelling Brighton at the Etihad. (21.10).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Back at the Etihad and back to winning ways, Pep Guardiola and Manchester City face Crystal Palace in the Premier League. Palace suffered late defeat to Liverpool last weekend. (16.12).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: A week on from their trip to the Emirates, Fulham are back in Premier League action at Manchester City. João Palhinha rescued Fulham at Arsenal last weekend in their 2-2 draw. (02.09).

programme.desc: Remember a classic match from the Premier League. Here, Chelsea and Arsenal go head-to-head in an eight-goal thriller at Stamford Bridge back in 2011.

programme.desc: Jermain Defoe is one of the Premier League's greatest ever scorers, netting 162 times in the competition. Here, learn about his obsession for goals and what he has planned after retiring.

programme.title: PL Retro: Leicester v Man United
programme.desc: A classic Premier League match as Leicester City hosted Manchester United at the King Power Stadium in 2014. Down 3-1, the Foxes would make a remarkable comeback.

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Next for City is the visit of Forest to the Etihad. The champions maintained their perfect start in the capital last week, with Haaland providing the decisive finish in a 3-1 win. (23.09).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Firmly rooted at the bottom of the Premier League table, Sheffield United and Chris Wilder arrive at the home of the newly crowned world champions - Pep Guardiola's Manchester City. (30.12).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Manchester United are back at Old Trafford for Bournemouth's Premier League visit. The Cherries claimed all three points at Selhurst midweek, while Ten Hag's side beat Chelsea 2-1. (09.12).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Brentford are United's opponents at Old Trafford in the Premier League. Defeat at home to Palace last weekend saw United make their worst start to a league campaign in 34 years. (07.10).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Following defeat at the Emirates, United host Brighton. The visitors beat Newcastle previously, as Evan Ferguson became just the fourth teenager to net a Premier League hat-trick. (16.09).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Days after meeting in the EFL Cup, United and Palace clash again at Old Trafford. In United's last Premier League outing, they picked up a much-needed win away at Turf Moor. (30.09).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Still firmly in contention for the top four, Manchester United host Marco Silva's Fulham as Rasmus Hojlund looks to extend his run of scoring in six successive Premier League games. (24.02).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Having stole victory at the death away at Fulham a week ago, United suffered a midweek European setback. Can Ten Hag and his side bounce back in the Premier League at home to Luton? (11.11).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights

programme.title: Chronicles of a Champion Golfer..
programme.desc: A look at one of The Open's great champions. Here, the focus is on American Phil Mickelson, who won his sole Championship in 2013 at Muirfield Golf Links.

programme.title: The Hundred Bitesize Highlights
programme.desc: In the Men's Hundred, Manchester Originals welcome Welsh Fire to Old Trafford. (25.07).

programme.title: Belgian F1 GP Highlights 2023
programme.desc: Steeped in history, Spa is set for the next chapter to be written as the lights go out at the 2023 Belgian Grand Prix. Last year's race saw Max Verstappen head a Red Bull one-two. (30.07).

programme.title: Hungarian F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: It's lights out at the Hungaroring for the 2024 Hungarian Grand Prix. Last year, Lewis Hamilton led a mixed-up grid from the start, but it was Max Verstappen who took the race win. (21.07).

programme.title: Best Of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: Two division rivals square off on Christmas Day at Lincoln Financial Field during week 16 of the NFL, as the Philadelphia Eagles, who have a playoff spot, host the New York Giants. (25.12).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Lopez v Ortiz
programme.desc: Teofimo Lopez puts his WBO super-lightweight crown on the line in Las Vegas as Jamaine Ortiz challenges the 26-year-old American in what will be his first world title shot. (09.02).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: The Green Bay Packers go to the Minnesota Vikings during week 17 of the NFL. The Packers kept themselves in the NFC playoff hunt with a Christmas Eve win over the Panthers. (31.12).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: The Pittsburgh Steelers host the Cleveland Browns at Acrisure Stadium in week two of the 2023 NFL season. Cleveland opened the season with a 24-3 victory over the Bengals. (18.09).

programme.title: Senior Open Championship Hlts
programme.desc: The opening day of the 2024 Senior Open Championship, staged at Carnoustie in Scotland. Germany's Alex Cejka won last year's competition at Royal Porthcawl in Wales. (25.07).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Lomachenko v Kambosos
programme.desc: In his quest to recapture a world title, Ukraine's legendary Vasiliy Lomachenko travels to Perth to face Australia's George Kambosos for the vacant IBF lightweight championship. (12.05).

programme.title: European Challenge Tour Golf
programme.desc: The European Challenge Tour took to Austria for the 2024 Euram Bank Open, held at Golf Club Adamstal in Ramsau. It was a maiden Challenge Tour victory for last season's winner Casey Jarvis.
